sentences.en: A degree is by no means an essential qualification for a journalist.
sentences.cn: 一纸文凭并不是成为一名记者的关键条件.

sentences.en: At least 3 years working experience in mechanical electronic component qualification.
sentences.cn: 3年以上机械电子元器件认证工作经验.

sentences.en: Be responsible for the process qualification and process audit.
sentences.cn: 负责生产过程质量控制和过程审核.

sentences.en: Complete and accept qualification, conduction license manages a gender.
sentences.cn: 竣工验收合格性, 办理许可经营性.

sentences.en: He insisted that such a qualification had no place in the President's message.
sentences.cn: 他硬说总统的电文是不应该包括上述的限制语.

sentences.en: He left school without any qualifications.
sentences.cn: 他离校时没有拿到任何文凭。

sentences.en: health and fitness qualifications for membership in the Territorial Army
sentences.cn: 加入本土防卫义勇军所需要的健康条件

sentences.en: Learn from the experience and improve technology qualification step by step.
sentences.cn: 总结经验,不断提高技术素质.

sentences.en: Previous experience is not an essential qualification for the job.
sentences.cn: 以前的经验不是获得这份工作的必要条件.

sentences.en: Salary will be determined according to your working experience and qualification.
sentences.cn: 按照工作经验和资历来确定工资的级别.

sentences.en: Search and screen domestic suppliers to do raw material qualification.
sentences.cn: 寻找和筛选本地供应商做原材料认证.

sentences.en: Take part in Kick off meeting for product qualification approval.
sentences.cn: 参加产品质量认证开工会.

sentences.en: The ability to impart knowledge and command respect is the essential qualification for teachers.
sentences.cn: 具备传授知识并赢得尊敬的能力是对教师的基本要求。

sentences.en: The qualification of such a course of action as conservation is too mild.
sentences.cn: 把这种行动方针称作保守是太轻了.

sentences.en: They had every qualification for success.
sentences.cn: 他们具备获得成功的各种条件.

sentences.en: This can be decorated with the company's certificate of qualification to see.
sentences.cn: 这可以从装潢公司具有的资质证书看.

sentences.en: This software applies to manage welding procedure qualification for steel pressure vessels.
sentences.cn: 该软件适用于钢制压力容器焊接工艺评定的各项管理工作.

words.tran_cn: 限定词，[语] 限定语；取得资格的人；修饰语
限制（qualify的过去分词）；描述；授权予
限制；使具有资格；证明…合格

phrases.tran_cn: 资格考试；合格试验；质量鉴定试验
焊接工艺评定；焊接程序评定

trans.tran_cn: 资格，授权，条件，限制，合格证书
trans.tran_en: if you have a qualification, you have passed an examination or course to show you have a particular level of skill or knowledge in a subject
